Text: Edgar I (Old English: "Ēadgār" ;  943 8 July 975), known as the Peaceful or the Peaceable, was King of England from 959 until his death.

Text: Edgar the Peaceful:  As king, Edgar further consolidated the political unity achieved by his predecessors, with his reign being noted for its relative stability.
